name: 3 Piece Set - Allah - Kalima - Mohammed
description:
-Available in two sizes: (Each Piece) 12" x 12" OR 16" x 16" (inches) Total length of all 3 pieces 36" OR 48"

-Gallery Wrapped, so the image is wrapped around the canvas frame.

-High Quality 270gsm Canvas specially coated to deliver crisp & vibrant colour with long lasting durability.
	
-Printed at high resolution using the latest state of the art colour technology ensures sharp & vivid images every time.
	
-Professionally mounted onto 38mm deep treated kiln dried wooden stretcher bars, guaranteed not to warp or crack. Each canvas is supplied with plastic wedges for tightening the canvas to ensure your canvas art is always perfect.
	
-The canvas is ready to hang straight from the box and will transform any wall instantly.

***Colours in artwork may differ from those shown depending on individual monitor settings***
